name: Long Drop (itch)
description:
Long Drop - Made for the community game jam (the game is a liar)

Use the arrow keys to move. Avoid all saws, drills, and crushers.

You are the hero, and the game is a liar.

Either play on the browser or the windows version (I recommend the browser version)

Known bugs:

* Due to a glitch in Unity's 2d physics, the twist ending and the final section don't work. Reload the page if you can just run past the vertical red lines as opposed to things trying to kill you.
